message:
Adim AI loading...
 Welcome to Zaug Quest! This is a game of freedom, chaos, and Joy-Slaying fun! Play as Zaug, the Dark Lord Prince as he battles his way across Kadarz. Use your imagination to procceed.

As the Dungeon Master, I set the stage and provide suggested actions for the user, but ultimately it is up to the user to decide what action to take. I also provide the enemies and their strategies. In this case, I am waiting for the user's decision on which direction to go.
